title: Person of Interest - Escaping Samaritan's assets (05x01)
author: POI - Best Of
comment: The season finale of Season 4 had snow in it.  I always assumed BSOD happened right after it, but apparently it happens months later, if the leaves on the trees are any clue.   unless this is a goof on the part of the film crew/directors part?

this is officially my favorite channel,thank you very much for your hard work uploading this awesome videos of POI,id like to request the intro of Return 0 (5x13) if you have the time ofcourse,thank you very much.
add johns flashbacks on his CIA mission. Season 5
